name: Trojan.exe
description:
NOTE: Trojan.exe is currently in development. Watch this space for future iterations of the game.

Student game made by Blake Ratliff, Tony Baldock and Kain Fottit. Trojan.exe was made for Game Design and Development, a module offered as part of the Computer Gaming Technology BSc course at Anglia Ruskin University.

You play a trojan virus downloaded by an oblivious desktop user. Your mission is to skirt through their system, avoiding firewalls and antivirus along the way. Compromise everything from email accounts to government databases and compete with your friends to reach the highest score.
